thoughts: Enjoys the silence of the shadows
Is stronger than most cats think
Is sleeping in a puddle of muck
Orders an apprentice to deal with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} ticks, and is laughed off
Is telling frightening stories to anycat that will listen
Is struggling to walk through the mud
Barks out a dry laugh at another cat's failure
Knows what {PRONOUN/m_c/subject}{VERB/m_c/'ve/'s} done to end up here
Can't muster the energy to groom the mud from {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} matted pelt
Has managed to convince another cat to help groom {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} matted fur
Tells a story, then another, then another...
Is staring wistfully at the StarClan border
Bested a warrior during a battle
Is used to the feeling of dirty paws
